subject: Free Agents (Sports)
organizations: Fairmont Turnberry Isle Resort & Club Soffer Course
lead_paragraph: Mike Piazza hit one 290 yards — straight into the cup. Piazza, a free-agent catcher, made a hole-in-one on the par-4 opening hole of The Fairmont Turnberry Isle Resort & Club Soffer Course in Aventura, Fla., on Nov. 19. The drive was right on line, landing in the cup for a double-eagle.
